job.title: Software Engineer
job.industry: Information Services,Information Technology and Services,Computer Software
job.description: pEveryone wants a career with impact Here youll be helping some of the worlds most renowned and ambitious companies build winning cloud platformsppbrppstrongResponsibilitiesstrongpulliWork with customers to define design and develop complex multitier distributed software applications on cloud platforms  AWS  GCPliliPassionate about mentoring team members and bringing in new technologies within the larger teamliliWork handson with cloud native services to demonstrate and prototype outcomes in customerpartner environmentsliliWork in a supportive environment with many growth opportunitiesliulpbrppstrongTechnical Requirementsstrongpulli3 years of experience with Java and Spring Boot frameworkliliExperience building architecting designing and implementing highly distributed global cloudbased systems on either AWS or GCPliliExperience building or integrating with Continuous IntegrationDelivery processliliExperience implementing platform components such as RESTful APIs Message Queues Systems Observability Services State Management Systems Caching etcliliHandson micro services architecture experience using Spring boot Docker and KubernetesliliExpertise with the AWS or GCP cloud native servicesliliSelfstarter and strong quick problem solving skillsliliAbility to communicate with clients on a business level and translate their needs into a technical solutionliliBonus if you have experience with both AWS and GCPliliBonus if you have experience with Google Kubernetes EngineliliBonus if you are familiar with provisioning and automating infrastructure with infrastructure as code tool such as Terraform or Cloud FormationliliBonus if you have experience using Anthos BigQuery BigTable TensorFlowliulpbrppstrongBenefits IncludestrongpulliCompetitive compensationliliGenerous benefitsliliFlexible vacation and PTO policies we have a minimum vacation policy in factliul
